name: Smithing Rush
description:
Smithing Rush is a free to download and play game. The game can be completed,  It's still in Early Access so things may/probably will change with feedback.

It's a fast paced smithing game for 1 or 2 Players. It has a Story Mode were you have to run your masters blacksmith store with help from your friend Fate who'll give youmissions to complete and progress the game., Also level up, buy upgrades and attract new customers!

It's a cute Indie Game developed by one person. Me!
Has other game modes that you have to unlock through story mode.

Please Support my future releases I'm working on by subscribing to my Youtube and following my Steam page!

Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198225371748
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiyYHYKooCAjKD3c5kIeKzA?view_as=subscriber

Supporting me is free, like this game~

If you really want to be a super supporter to this indie developer, you can buy me a coffee by donating money on the download page!

Long term goal: Get the game ported to steam with achievements and extra content. Then work on other projects.
